com.clarionmedia.infinitum.ui.context

Interface InfinitumUiContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BeanProvider, EventSubscriber, InfinitumContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XmlInfinitumUiContext

    public interface InfinitumUiContext
extends InfinitumContext, BeanProvider, EventSubscriber

    InfinitumUiContext is an extension of InfinitumContext that contains configuration information for the framework UI module.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 01/13/13
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
